about_the_game:
In a medieval village, the inhabitants tell each other a legend about a vampire-like beast that kidnaps people.

One day, Elaine ventures too far into the dark forest and is attacked by a monster. When she wakes up, she finds herself in an abandoned castle. She wants to escape as quickly as possible.

Explore dark places and learn all about the secrets of the abandoned castle.

Find out the truth about the mysterious legend and the monster in this exciting hidden object adventure!

Solve tricky puzzles and play many relaxing mini-games!

  • Experience the exciting story about a sinister legend in this hidden object game

  • Immerse yourself in numerous fantastic hidden object scenes with lots of tasks

  • Solve many mini-games and tricky puzzles
